scene_description_enriched: A crowned female figure with long blonde hair, wearing a white garment adorned with black spots and a reddish-brown outer robe, holds a sword in her left hand and an open book in her right. She is depicted with a halo, suggesting sainthood. In the background, a stylized castle or fortress is visible on a hill, set against a blue sky with some rocky formations. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
